channel.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Bleeding Heart Pigeons on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Stir
item.description: Songwriting, Production, Vocals, Guitar, Electronics Hear it on Bandcamp The second full-length album by the Limerick art-rock band Bleeding Heart Pigeons, containing a collection of introspective and sonically adventurous pop songs. My roles in the project were lead songwriter/composer, lead vocalist, guitarist, electronics, engineer and producer. The album was written and recorded while working with Virgin Records, and was self-released independently in 2020 after leaving the label. Press coverage of ‘Stir’:

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Trapped (360 MV)
item.description: Concept, Direction, Generative Visuals, Editing Watch Here An interactive VR music video that I made under the restrictions of strict COVID-19 lockdown in May 2020. Old footage of the band was recycled and combined with algorithmic visuals to create something new. The viewer is surrounded with abstract construction in the VR world, echoing the songs lyrical themes of confinement and entrapment.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Real Connection/Weddings & Wakes
item.description: Songwriting, Production, Mix (track 2), Vocals, Guitar, Electronics Hear it on Bandcamp EP by Limerick art-rock band Bleeding Heart Pigeons

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Is
item.description: Songwriting, Production, Vocals, Guitar, Electronics, Album Art Hear it on Spotify The debut album by art-rock band Bleeding Heart Pigeons, a 75-minute collection of songs based on existential themes. My roles in the project were lead songwriter/composer, lead vocalist, guitarist, engineer and producer. Released on Virgin Records UK, it was distributed worldwide, and led to the band supporting The Pixies, Beach House, Father John Misty, Villagers, Andrew Bird and others.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Anything You Want (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Performer, Editor Watch here Music video for ‘Anything You Want’ by Bleeding Heart Pigeons, depicting repressed fantasies of a dairy farmer.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - Visiting Myself in Hospital (MV)
item.description: Concept, Director, Performer, Editor Watch Here Music video for ‘Visiting Myself in Hospital’ by Bleeding Heart Pigeons. Very early stuff. You could say juvenilia.

item.title: Bleeding Heart Pigeons - In a Room in Littleton, Colorado EP
item.description: Songwriting, Production, Mix, Vocals, Guitar, Electronics, Album Art Hear it on Spotify Debut release by Limerick art-rock band Bleeding Heart Pigeons. Made when we were teenagers.
